testcase.name: TC_014 Password must be reused in the same way
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to hubcomfyUrl..............................................passed Then User verifies that he or she went to the home page.....................passed Then User click the register button.........................................passed Then User clicks on the Become a vendor link................................passed When User go to minuteEmail to receive a valid and unique email.............passed And User receive the email from the page they go to.........................passed And The user returns to the hub-comfy page and enters the email in the email box.passed And User clicks the RE-SEND CODE button.....................................passed And The user goes back to minuteEmail to get the code sent to the email address.passed And User receives the code and returns to hubcomfy..........................passed And The user enters the code that comes to the e-mail address entered in the Verification Code box.passed And User enter a valid password.............................................passed And The user enters the same valid password in the confirm password as they enter in the password.passed And User clicks the register button.........................................passed And The user verifies seeing the text Welcome to Hubcomfy!..................passed And User quits page.........................................................passed
